meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>task</kanji> is to open this pickle <kanji>container</kanji>. Why you? Because you are so <vocabulary>dextrous</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>skillful</vocabulary> when it comes to opening pickles.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
